subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: Dufner’s 2013 P.G.A. Championship title has made more people pay attention to him and his game, even if his putting remains shaky and he has not won lately.
snippet: Dufner’s 2013 P.G.A. Championship title has made more people pay attention to him and his game, even if his putting remains shaky and he has not won lately.
